playn.core

Class StubPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.StubPlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Platform

    public class StubPlatform
extends Object
implements Platform
    A stub implementation of Platform that provides implementations of those services that can be usefully implemented for unit tests, and throws UnsupportedOperationException for the rest. This can usefully be extended in tests to provide test implementations for just the aspects of the platform that are needed to support the code under test.

    The services that are implemented are:

    • type() - reports Platform.Type.STUB
    • time() - returns current time
    • random() - returns Math.random()
    • invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable) - invokes the supplied runnable immediately on the calling thread
    • setLifecycleListener(playn.core.PlayN.LifecycleListener) - tracks the supplied listener, never generates events
    • log - writes logs to stderr
    • storage - maintains an in-memory storage map
    • json - provides full JSON parsing and formatting
    • pointer - allows listener registration, never generates events
    • mouse - allows listener registration, never generates events
    • touch - allows listener registration, never generates events
    • keyboard - allows listener registration, never generates events
